title: Dmytro Dushko’s personal website
text:
Dmytro Dushko is a junior researcher at the Center for Food and Land Use Research at Kyiv School of Economics. In 2020-2022 he as well studies at the MSc programme of KSE, “Economic Analysis”. At KSE C4FLUR Dmytro conducts research on damages and losses in agriculture, forestry and fisheries, and analyzes changes in prices and policies in the agri-food sector. He participated in a research grant from the Applied Finance Program (RGAF), and worked in audit, where he was responsible for the full-scale annual audit of the international metallurgical and mining company in Ukraine, in particular in the sections of fraud risk, operating costs and court costs. His research interests also include measuring the effects of scale, scope, and density in the logistics sector, in particular, of Ukrzaliznytsia.













You can download my CV here. ()






Interests

Education



1 + 1

[1] 2

#Data cleaning and processing
US map

#US map
us <- map_data('state')
county <- us_map(regions = c("county"))
county1 <- map_data("county")


#delete repetitions
county %>% distinct(full, county,fips, group,piece, .keep_all = TRUE) -> county_no_dbl


#Merge data
names(county_no_dbl)[names(county_no_dbl) == "county"] <- "County"
names(county_no_dbl)[names(county_no_dbl) == "full"] <- "State"

county_no_dbl %>% mutate(Location = paste0(State, " ", County)) -> county_no_dbl
food_access %>% mutate(Location = paste0(State, " ", County)) -> food_access

county_no_dbl %>% select(x, y,fips,piece,group, Location) %>% right_join(food_access, by = "Location") -> df


#Rename variables
df$Vehicle_Access_1_Mile <- df$`Vehicle Access.1 Mile`
df$Vehicle_Access_1_2_Mile <- df$`Vehicle Access.1/2 Mile`
df$Vehicle_Access_10_Miles <- df$`Vehicle Access.10 Miles`
df$Vehicle_Access_20_Miles <- df$`Vehicle Access.20 Miles`
df$Housing_Data_Residing_in_Group_Quarters <- df$`Housing Data.Residing in Group Quarters`
df$Housing_Data_Total_Housing_Units <- df$`Housing Data.Total Housing Units`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Children_1_Mile <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Children.1 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Children_1_2_Mile <- df$`Vehicle Access.1/2 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Children_10_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Children.10 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Children_20_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Children.20 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_1_Mile <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Low Income People.1 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_1_2_Mile <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Low Income People.1/2 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_10_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Children.10 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_20_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Children.20 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_People_1_Mile <- df$`Vehicle Access.1 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_People_1_2_Mile <- df$`Vehicle Access.1/2 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_People_10_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.People.10 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_People_20_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.People.20 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_1_Mile <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Seniors.1 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_1_2_Mile <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Seniors.1/2 Mile`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_10_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Seniors.10 Miles`
df$Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_20_Miles <- df$`Low Access Numbers.Seniors.20 Miles`


# Creating new data set and ordering by state
df1 <- df %>% select(State, fips,Population,Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_1_2_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_People_1_Mile, Vehicle_Access_1_Mile,Vehicle_Access_1_2_Mile,Housing_Data_Residing_in_Group_Quarters,
                     Housing_Data_Total_Housing_Units,Vehicle_Access_10_Miles,Vehicle_Access_20_Miles,Low_Access_Numbers_Children_1_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_Children_1_2_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_10_Miles,
                     Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_20_Miles,Low_Access_Numbers_Children_10_Miles,Low_Access_Numbers_Children_20_Miles,Low_Access_Numbers_Low_Income_People_1_Mile,
                     Low_Access_Numbers_People_1_2_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_People_1_2_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_People_10_Miles,Low_Access_Numbers_People_20_Miles,
                     Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_1_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_1_2_Mile,Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_10_Miles,Low_Access_Numbers_Seniors_20_Miles,Location)



df1 = df1[order(df1$State), ]

#Plot data

#Plotting data
#1.1
p1 <- plot_usmap(data = df1, values = "Vehicle_Access_1_Mile", labels=FALSE) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Count", limits = c(0,10000))+
  easy_move_legend(to = c("right")) +
  labs(title = "Vehicle Access.1 Mile") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(colour = "black"))



#1.2
p2 <- plot_usmap(data = df1, values = "Vehicle_Access_1_2_Mile", labels=FALSE) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Count", limits = c(0,10000))+
  easy_move_legend(to = c("right")) +
  labs(title = "Vehicle Access.1/2 Mile") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(colour = "black"))


p1 + p2





#1.3
p3 <- plot_usmap(data = df1, values = "Vehicle_Access_10_Miles", labels=FALSE) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Count", limits = c(0,1500))+
  easy_move_legend(to = c("right")) +
